message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I can go as low as $190 for it. I believe this product will really benefit you, and it's a fair price for the value it brings.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $165?
